name: A Call To The Void
description:
A full fledged game in very early stages. Actively in development. There will be bugs and weird features. Contact me here to report bugs and features (thank you): https://discord.gg/vmRGKdDVwe

I also can't accept donations rn for many reasons, if you want to support me join the discord!
Current gameplan:

v0.1 -Indev

Small entrance part of map, picking up items, rabbits

I will add more to the changelog as updates release!

V0.2 - Indev [Current]

You can now pickup stone, press I for inventory, e to pickup

Text works!
